title: Post Game: Democrats push Biden to meet the moment, with Hallie Jackson
description: As Presidents Biden and Trump both inch toward reprising their role as their respective party nominees, challengers are testing the waters on either side in potential forecasts of 2024 primaries to come. NBC News Senior Washington Correspondent Hallie Jackson joins Chuck to dive deep into the changing political landscape.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
